attributes.action: Give Year 11 students their target grades for GCSEs
attributes.background: I believe instead of postponing exams you should grant the students in Year 11 their target / predicted grades. Otherwise it would mean pushing back sixth form and college start dates etc.

rejection.details:
Decisions about exams are a matter for exam boards and individual schools, and are not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
